name: Paycheck to Paycheck
description:
You and your family have just moved into a new city with a mere $100 to your name. You must find a way to pay the bills and put food on the table or you and your family will suffer the consequences. In Paycheck to Paycheck you must decide how to allocate your money and how much of your life are willing to sacrifice to make ends meet. Is it worth it to work overtime so that your kid can see a doctor and eat food tonight?

Made for LD 44 Your Life is Currency
Programming by MiltonNH25, Art by Choco and Quinn, Music by XanderTon, Sound by Quinn
